title: Why Has the U.S. Stock Market Done So Well? And Can It Continue?
sub_head: American stocks have been a global standout. But that exceptionalism may not last as Covid retreats.
body: The U.S. is on a winning streak. Four years running, through political turmoil and Covid-19, American stock markets have beaten the world. As we hit the second anniversary of the pandemic, investors should be asking whether it can continue.
